home: This is the Home page. Here you can view all your profiles at a glance.
about: The About page tells you who built this app and why.
add profile: On the Add Profiles page you can create a new profile by filling out the form and clicking Submit.
login: Use the Login page to sign in with your credentials. Once logged in, you'll see your personalized data.
logout: Clicking Logout in the navbar will sign you out and clear your session.
help: I'm here to help! Ask me about any part of the app: Home, About, Add Profile, Login, Logout, or anything else.
default: Sorry, I don't understand that. Try asking about Home, About, Add Profile, Login, or Logout.
